p: Among the patients achieving EOT but not SVR-12, twelve were lost to follow-up (6 from group A and 6 from group B), and only one (belonging to group B) had a relapse. This patient was a non-cirrhotic subject infected with HCV genotype 3, who had received the SOF + DCV + RBV combination for 12 weeks; he had resistance testing performed at failure which demonstrated a resistance pattern against NS5A (Y93H).
